attributes.action: Ban the the sale of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.additional_details: Because it distresses animals and wildlife. They are let off at all times of the year and at crazy times at night and sometimes even the day.
attributes.background: To ban all sales of fireworks to the general public and only be sold to organised events.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
